name: LIONS OF PATNA SERVICE TRUST

address: Near Lohia Nagar Mount Carmel High School

briefDescription: “Sri Sai Lions Netralaya”, is a non-profit Eye Hospital run by “Lions of Patna Service Trust”, a registered Charitable Trust having Registration No.211 of the year 2002 dated 26.3.2002 of Registering Authority, Patna. A 100 bedded Eye Hospital with many specialized services, advance diagnostic equipments and full fledged four operation theatres, it is working towards prevention of blindness in and around Patna since its inception in December, 2004. Till date it has performed more than 70,000+ Cataract Surgeries with IOL implants and other eye related surgeries such as Glaucoma, DCR, DCT, Squint,PTR. SSLN is running 15 Vision Centres.Free Eye Screening Camps are organised throughout the year and approx 60,000 people are served every year
